title: Osun ALGON, PDP clash over Supreme Court verdict on allocations
description:
Osun’s ALGON and PDP offer conflicting views on a Supreme Court ruling dismissing a suit over withheld local government allocations in the state.

Read More: https://punchng.com/osun-algon-pdp-clash-over-supreme-court-verdict-on-allocations/
content: The Supreme Courts dismissal of a suit filed by the Osun State Attorney General, Oluwole Jimi-Bada, seeking to compel the Federal Government to release withheld local government allocations, on Frida… [+3059 chars]
